AboutInfo.title: About Us
AboutInfo.description1: Ei Solutions is a tech company which offers EU-taxonomy services for the real estate sector. The company was founded 2021 in Trondheim out of research projects at NTNU's Department of Civil and Environmental Engineering.
AboutInfo.description2: The goal is to help the real estate industry to become more sustainable and to obtain the financial benefits it entails. The team consists of ambitious people with passion for sustainability, technology and real estate.

HeroBanner.title: A simpler way to deal with climate risk for real estate
HeroBanner.description: Our solutions makes it easy to overcome the complexity in dealing with the EU-taxonomy.

0.title: Data-driven insight and automation so you can prioritize the urgent measures
0.description: With spacial analysis of data and integrations with third-party services, we automate the unneccasary tasks and give you the insight and recommendations about the property.

0.title: Automatic Insight
0.description: Automatic insight and documentation on compliancy with DNSH and Substantial Contribution goals.

1.title: Systematic Walkthrough
1.description: Standardized and systematic application makes it easy to achieve proper taxonomy reporting

2.title: Recommended Measures
2.description: Easy to understand application and easy to understand reports with all the information needed.

1.title: Why comply with the EU-taxonomy?
1.0: Financial institutions grant favorable terms for those who report on compliancy with the taxonomy.
1.1: Suppliers, tenents and governments are pressured to buy or offer sustainable services. That means increased expenses for non-compliant companies and projects.
1.2: BREEAM-NOR manuals are tailored to the EU-taxonomy. Data-driven analysis frees resources to increase profits from sustainable projects.
